Title: Inunaki-mura x Taka no Tsume-dan
Description: ['A collaboration between the live-action horror film ', Inunaki-mura, ' slated to be released in theaters February 7, 2020 and the ', Eagle Talon, ' franchise. The film is based on the urban legend of the real-life abandoned Inunaki Village and the old tunnel that cut through the area.', '\n', '\n']
